iti27:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti27:2.1: “Mendicants, of all the grounds for making worldly merit, none are worth a sixteenth part of the heart’s release by love.
iti27:2.2: Surpassing them, the heart’s release by love shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:3.1: It’s like how the radiance of all the stars is not worth a sixteenth part of the moon’s radiance. Surpassing them, the moon’s radiance by love shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:3.2: In the same way, of all the grounds for making worldly merit, none are worth a sixteenth part of the heart’s release by love. Surpassing them, the heart’s release by love shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:4.1: It’s like the time after the rainy season when the sky is clear and cloudless. And when the sun rises, it dispels all the darkness from the sky as it shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:4.2: In the same way, of all the grounds for making worldly merit, none are worth a sixteenth part of the heart’s release by love. Surpassing them, the heart’s release by love shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:5.1: It’s like how after the rainy season the sky is clear and cloudless. At the crack of dawn, the Morning Star shines and glows and radiates.
iti27:5.2: In the same way, of all the grounds for making worldly merit, none are worth a sixteenth part of the heart’s release by love. Surpassing them, the heart’s release by love shines and glows and radiates.”
iti27:5.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti27:7.1: Loving just one creature with a hateless heart
iti27:7.4: a noble one creates abundant merit.
iti27:8.1: The royal potentates conquered this land
iti27:8.4: the sacrifices of the ‘stick-casting’, the ‘royal soma drinking’, and the ‘unbarred’.
iti27:9.1: These are not worth a sixteenth part
iti27:9.2: of the mind developed with love,
iti27:9.3: as starlight cannot rival the moon.
iti27:10.1: Don’t kill or cause others to kill,
iti27:10.2: don’t conquer or encourage others to conquer,
iti27:10.3: with love for all living creatures—
iti27:10.4: you’ll have no enmity for anyone.”
iti27:11.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
